article.title: Cyril
article.paragraph:
Infobox given nameCyril
Male
[[Greek language|Greek]] [[Cirillo]], [[Cyrille]], [[Cyryl]], [[Cyrillus]], [[Kiril]], [[Kirill]], [[Kirillos]], [[Kiryl]], [[Kyrylo]], [[Kiro]]
Cyril(also Cyrillus or Cyryl) is a masculine given name. It is derived from theGreek languageGreekname (Kyrillos) meaning "Lordly, Masterful" which in turn derives from Greek (Kyrios) "Lord". There are various variant forms of the Cyril name such as Cyrill, Cyrille, Kirill, Kiryl, Kirillos, Kyrylo, Kiril, Kiro and Kyrill.
